channel.title: Emote help!
channel.description:
Ok so i am starting a new server it was completely blank i dl'ed from rune locus. I quickly realized that for every weapon was the 2h block. i am sort of new at this kind of thing so if someone could tell me how to change the emotes for blocking that would be great thanks
~~RARES
